plot: A comical fight between two Hebrews; one a pushcart man, and the other a suspender peddler.
title: A Gesture Fight in Hester Street
plot_es: A comical fight between two Hebrews; one a pushcart man, and the other a suspender peddler.
original_name: A Gesture Fight in Hester Street
plot_en: A comical fight between two Hebrews; one a pushcart man, and the other a suspender peddler.
